CustomField.description: Used to calculate the age of when the diagnosis, death, or expience occurred
CustomField.formula:
IF(Date_of_Diagnosis__c < ADDMONTHS(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c, 12), TEXT(MONTH(Date_of_Diagnosis__c) - MONTH(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)) + " Months",
IF(Date_of_Diagnosis__c > ADDMONTHS(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c, 12), TEXT(FLOOR( (MONTH( Date_of_Diagnosis__c ) + (( 12 * (YEAR(Date_of_Diagnosis__c)- YEAR(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)))) - MONTH(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)) / 12 )) + " Years",
IF( Patient_Date_of_Death__c < ADDMONTHS(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c, 12), TEXT(MONTH(Patient_Date_of_Death__c) - MONTH(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)) + " Months",
TEXT(FLOOR( (MONTH( Patient_Date_of_Death__c ) + (( 12 * (YEAR(Patient_Date_of_Death__c)- YEAR(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)))) - MONTH(Patient_Date_of_Birth__c)) / 12 )) + " Years"
)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Age at Diagnosis, death, experience when it occurred.
CustomField.label: Claiment Age at Occurrence
